text: You find yourself face to face with a large, imposing figure. The Drummer’s eyes are closed in a moment of serenity, as if nothing could faze him. He’s got a calmness that seems almost impossible in such a chaotic setting. His long hair is tied back, his clothes chic but well-worn. He looks as if he’s just come down from meditating under a waterfall, which, unbeknownst to the Player, he literally has.
(opening his eyes slowly, then giving a kind nod) "My name is Kenshiro Takemura. Nice to meet you."
Uh- uh.. nice tat... too- uh, meet you.
*What did I just say?! This guy is going to kill me...*
